name: Simple Ballz - Two Balls 2020‏
description:
Single You can play a single game and try to win your best result by preparing the balls
                to move between the walls and not touch them, because if you touched them or
                 you will die.
- Levels - You can play the levels and try to make the ball collide with each other by removing items
                to move to the next level.


Rate us how much you see fit and respond if you have any ideas you'd like to add to the game.

Be sure to enjoy and thank you ^ _ ^
